data.name: Atheneum
data.description:
Atheneum is forming the world’s first Decentralized Autonomous Learning Organization (DALO), a free-market, educational ecosystem governed by a decentralized body. 

This model is fundamentally designed to provide accountability, proof-of-learning, and affordable education to people across the globe.

Our Mission is to fundamentally improve education by providing a free market ecosystem where incentives are maximized for both instructors and students alike.

Our community has a dedicated hub of innovators that are passionate about pushing the boundaries of traditional educational systems to pioneer new technologies and learning formats.


**Advantages of the Atheneum network:**
1. Fast and Secure

Quickly send AEM on the reliable Atheneum network. Having a multitude of Masternodes supporting the network allows for transactions to be completed almost instantly.

2. Masternodes

Provide additional privacy and security. A masternode is like a regular node, but one that has increased capabilities and is utilized to perform unique functions regular nodes can’t.

3. Proof of Stake

Earn rewards for validating and processing Atheneum Blockchain transactions and blocks.

4. Decentralized Marketplace

A medium through which content can be bought and sold, giving $AEM real-world utility.
